targets.rawSql:
select  altitude as Höhe, location as Ort, state as Land, temperature as "°C", airpressure as mBar, airpressure_trend as Trend,
 wind_direction as "W.Richtung", weather_time as Zeit from WetterÖsterreich 
 where state="$Bundesland" and location = "$Ort"
order by weather_time desc
limit 5

select temperature as Temperatur
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 1 hour)
order by weather_timestamp desc
Limit 1

select dewpoint(temperature,humidity) as Taupunkt
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 1 hour)
order by weather_timestamp desc
Limit 1

select  humidity as Feucht
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 1 hour)
order by weather_timestamp desc
Limit 1

select  airpressure as Druck
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 2 hour)
order by weather_timestamp desc
Limit 1

select  raindown as Niederschlag
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 2 hour)
order by weather_timestamp desc
Limit 1

select sun, weather_time, weather_timestamp 
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 1 hour)
order by weather_timestamp desc
limit 1

select  wind_speed as Wind
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 1.5 hour)
order by weather_timestamp asc
Limit 1

select  windpeak as Wind
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and weather_time> (now() - interval 1.5 hour)
order by weather_timestamp asc
Limit 1

select temperature, DewPoint(temperature,humidity), weather_time
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(weather_time)

select humidity,weather_time
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(weather_time) 
ORDER BY temperature

select airpressure,weather_time
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(weather_time) 
ORDER BY temperature

select sun,weather_time
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(weather_time) 
ORDER BY temperature

select raindown,weather_time
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(weather_time) 
ORDER BY temperature

select wind_speed, windpeak,weather_time
from WetterÖsterreich
where state = "$Bundesland" and location= "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(weather_time) 
ORDER BY temperature

panels.title: Extremwerte Klicken sie auf die Spalte nach der Sie sortieren wollen

panels.description: sort by column clicking on the column by which you want to sort

targets.rawSql:
select distinct altitude as Höhe, location as "Ort", temperature as Temp, wind_speed as Wind, 
windpeak as Böen, raindown as Niederschlag,DATE_FORMAT(weather_time + interval 1 hour, '%H:%i') as Zeit from WetterCDN.WetterÖsterreich 
where weather_time > now() -interval 1 hour
order by Temp asc

panels.title: Extremwerte

list.definition: select distinct state from WetterÖsterreich where weather_timestamp> now() - interval 2 hour
list.name: Bundesland
list.query: select distinct state from WetterÖsterreich where weather_timestamp> now() - interval 2 hour

list.definition:
select  distinct location from WetterÖsterreich
where (state="$Bundesland") and (weather_timestamp > now()- interval 2 hour)
list.name: Ort
list.query:
select  distinct location from WetterÖsterreich
where (state="$Bundesland") and (weather_timestamp > now()- interval 2 hour)
